UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the amino acid sequence of the UniProt entry.

Literature.Title: Acyl-substituted dermaseptin S4 derivatives with improved bactericidal properties, including on oral microflora
Literature.Author: Porat Y, Marynka K, Tam A, Steinberg D, Mor A

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Bacillus cereus ATCC 11778(MIC=3µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=3µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 35218(MIC=3µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 9027(MIC=4.5±1.5µM),Streptococcus mutans ATCC 27351(MIC=8µM),Actinomyces viscosus ATCC 43146(MIC=16µM),Aggregatibacter actinomycetemcomitans ATCC 29523(MIC=16µM),Streptococcus salivarius ATCC 25975(MIC=>32µM)
